name: A murder in Heaven
description:
A murder in Heaven

An unfinished experiment for MiniJam 70. It was supposed to be a procedurally generated stage play where you played as the script. Your input would consist of increasing or decreasing the amount of Drama, after which the game would generate the next scene. Within the time limit, I managed to finalize the cast-generator and interpersonal conflict-generator. Just press Z or X to generate a new cast and use the arrow keys to read a bit about the characters. That's all you can do right now.

Lessons learned: Don't try to write an interactive procedural story generator in a weekend.
